summary.body: There was a spate of graffiti alongside Defoe House over last weekend.  This was quickly removed by the Barbican staff on Monday but it's the first time I've seen this on the Estate.  Has anywhere else been affected?
summary.subject: Graffiti

summary.body: I wonder if our local police office can cast any light on the rumour on the main discussion pages?
summary.subject: Barbican burglaries?

summary.body: You may wish to respond here to the thread about Vandalism on the main residents' discussion area
summary.subject: Vandalism?
